caption:
The concept behind our Original Steamcream was to create a cream that could be used on the whole body, not just the face. 

And so, blended using the power of Pure Steam, our Original Steamcream was born.

Fast-forward all these years, and Steamcream is predominantly known as a face cream 😆 But we are actually a whole-body cream - including hands.

How nice is it you can take just 1 tin on your travels/ trip to the gym or to work, and know you can use it for all your skin-hydrating needs 🤩

#WholeBodyCream #NotJustForTheFace #SootheYourSkinHappy #OneTinDoesItAll #VeganSkincare #CrueltyFreeBeauty #OriginalMoisturiser #steamcreamskincare #moisturiseandprotect #skincare #madeinjapan #makingskincaresimple #SimpleSkincare
